feed.title: 0git, branch HEAD
feed.subtitle: 0git - a list of git repositories on ZeroNet

entry.title: Verify urls are ZeroNet links.
entry.content:
commit 8fb9f652c5c33e149f810c2b0d61e04c0588f78e parent 870073b69be2d2601ccc43791c5cf529688c1a7a Author: Jakukyo Friel <weakish@gmail.com> Date: Sun Jan 8 19:46:14 +0800
Verify urls are ZeroNet links.
A determined user can still submit non ZeroNet urls via directly editing data.json.
